Package org.apache.lucene.tests.index

Class MergingCodecReader

java.lang.Object
org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader
org.apache.lucene.index.LeafReader
org.apache.lucene.index.CodecReader
org.apache.lucene.index.FilterCodecReader
org.apache.lucene.tests.index.MergingCodecReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class MergingCodecReader extends FilterCodecReader
CodecReader wrapper that performs all reads using the merging instance of the index formats.
